mng: to grab, to catch, to arrest, to snatch, to scratch

exm.mng: to attempt all tasks at once, to manage every detail regardless of its importance
to grasp firmly, to pay special attention to, to rush in, to make the most of
to capture (an image), to snap (a photo)
to snatch time, to rush, to hurry (up), to seize the moment
to blow one's top, to be driven mad, to become frantic
